version_description:
● An Intervalometer function has been added - Perfect to capture your time-lapses
● A Sleep Timer option has been added to dramatically reduce energy consumption during long exposures
● The Zoom slider has been replaced by gestures - Simply pinch or pan vertically to zoom in/out

● We also did numerous behind-the-scenes modifications to improve app performance and robustness. If you ever find a bug, please let us know by using the 'Contact us' option in the app settings.

Here's another update for you!

- Option to share pictures from the edit view
- Picture aspect ratio including 1:1
- Sporadic crash fixes

By the way, every time we release a new version, we lose all our ratings on the App Store which negatively affects our sales. Thus, we would REALLY appreciate if you could update your rating on the App Store (simply tap the ‘Rate or Review on App Store’ button in the app settings). Many thanks!!!

Here's another update for you!

- Apple Watch and Handoff support

- Added visual cue for Self-Timer
- Cosmetic tweaks to app icon and lower toolbar buttons

- Fixed alignment issue in Settings view
- Fixed crash when sharing on iOS 9.2

- Many behind the scene improvements

PLEASE NOTE that the Low Light capture mode now always uses full resolution. Other resolutions are too noisy for low light capture.

By the way, every time we release a new version, we lose all our ratings on the App Store which negatively affects our sales. Thus, we would REALLY appreciate if you could update your rating on the App Store (simply tap the ‘Rate or Review on App Store’ button in the app settings). Many thanks!!!

Here's another update for you!

- Apple Watch and Handoff support

- Added visual cue for Self-Timer
- Cosmetic tweaks to app icon and lower toolbar buttons

- Fixed alignment issue in Settings view
- Fixed crash when sharing on iOS 9.2

- Many behind the scene improvements

PLEASE NOTE that the Low Light capture mode now always uses full resolution. Other resolutions are too noisy for low light capture.
中国和日语

- 现在可手动调整ISO (耶!)
- 改进了所有3种拍摄模式的低光表现
- 新“降噪”设置
- 支持iPhone 7 Plus双摄像头
- 其他许多性能和稳定性改进

另外，每当我们发布新版本，都会失去App Store上的评分，这会影响我们的销量。因此，如果您能在App Store上重新给我们评分(只需在应用设置中点”去App Store上评分/评论”按钮)，我们会感激不尽！！！
错误修复和改进。

- 支持iOS 11。
- 性能和稳定性改进。
- 更多即将到来！

另外，每当我们发布新版本，都会失去App Store上的评分，这会影响我们的销量。因此，如果您能在App Store上重新给我们评分(只需在应用设置中点”去App Store上评分/评论”按钮)，我们会感激不尽！！！
- 支持iOS 11。

- 支持iPhone X。
- 性能和稳定性改进。

更多即将到来！

此版本仅修复了一些小问题，新功能即将推出!

- 修复了一些提示多次显示的问题
- 修复了“Boost”按钮不显示的问题
